1.0.0.name: wordpress/bsk-posts-google-map
1.0.0.description:
The plugin help you show posts/pages as marks on Google map. The custome post type can be supported also. It provides search form to let user do search and show posts as markers. With this plugin you may show your stores, hourse etc on Google map.

It is easy to use. You may control which post type will be supported in the plugin setting page. When you add/edit a new post/page/custome post type the Laittude & Longitude fields will display at the bottom of the form. And you may enter position data of the post there.

Just copy and paste the shortcode to where you want to show the map then you will see all posts with lat & lng will be shown as a mark on the Google Map and user may vist details by click them.
